Title: Relates to providing enhanced cancer disability benefits to volunteer firefighters
Summary: Provides that the tax levy limit shall not include a tax levy necessary for expenditures resulting from a local government meeting its obligation to provide enhanced cancer disability benefits to volunteer firefighters as required under section two hundred five-cc of the general municipal law.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to providing enhanced cancer disability benefits to volunteer firefighters
